page.title: 12HOUSING IN KNUTSFORD
page.content: The style of houses is very varied in Knutsford. People tend to prefer old fashioned property to modern property. Prices range from about Â£20,000 to Â£50,000 for an average sized house. For a terraced house,like Middle Walk and Moordale Road, the price would be around Â£20,000 but some terraced houses could range up to Â£40,000. For a semi-detached house the price is very varied. Detached houses are most common in Knutsford. Prices range from Â£30,000 - Â£60,000. There are not many bungalows in Knutsford and as they are of different sizes it is difficult to tell what the price range is. As you can see houses range not only in price but in size and style as well.
